entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who has been in a difficult position. He explains that he did not confront Malfoy earlier because he suspected that Voldemort would have killed him if he knew Dumbledore was suspicious of him.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the person who has been threatening Draco. He is described as someone who uses Legilimency against others.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as a person who has been entrusted with a mission by Voldemort. He is also described as someone who is being threatened by Voldemort and is forced to do his bidding.

entities.name: legilimency
entities.description: Legilimency is mentioned as a concept used by Voldemort against others.

relationships.description: Dumbledore can help Malfoy according to the text. This relationship is described in the sentence 'I can help you, Draco.'
Voldemort threatens Malfoy as mentioned in the sentence 'He told me to do it or he'll kill me.'
Dumbledore suspects Voldemort according to the text. This relationship is described in the sentence 'Because I knew that you would have been murdered if Lord Voldemort realised that I suspected you.'
Malfoy is controlled by Voldemort as mentioned in the sentence 'I've got no choice.'
